Verse 1: [A]Have Your way with [E/A]me, O [A]God, in the temple [E/A]of my [Bm7]heart Let [Bm7]reverent love and [A/C#]holy [D]awe{,} be [Bm7]lifted unto [E]You The [D]truth my inmost being claim{,} 'til [F#m]sin and shadows flee away [Bm7]Teach my feet to [A/C#]love Your [D]ways{,} and [Bm7]run the [E]way You [(intro)]choose

Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 have your way with me o god in the temple of my heart let reverent love and holy awe be lifted unto you the truth my inmost being claim til sin and shadows flee away teach my feet to love your ways and run the way you choose verse 2 have your way with me o lord sins pleasures i cannot afford they left me destitute and poor now all i want is christ a passion for the gospel burns to love your bride the holy church wash me with your blood and word til i am sanctified turn verse 3 holy spirit have your way i look to you for strength and faith i need your presence and your grace to persevere this hour complete in me what youve begun keep me by your sovereign love in my weakness spirit come and fill me with your power verse 4 jesus have your way with me you bled for all who would believe let my life become a seed and give me grace to die display through my surrendered life your selfless love and sacrifice until your glory fills the sky be praised and glorified
